cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 7th Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 7th Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription:
Private furnished rooms with bed, desk, wardrobe, and sink.
Shared bathrooms, kitchens, laundry, and lounge areas on each floor.
Includes Wi-Fi, gym, parking, and 24/7 security.
???? On Northbourne Ave, with bus and light rail at the door.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
